::Shadow Wing::

She jumped back, but his blade cut off her hand that held her gun.  
It dropped next to Killer.  She grabber her arm and ran towards the 
Ark.  She hoped to find some cover for a bit.  If she had enough 
time, her wing would heal and she could fly again.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killer::
> 
> Killer grunts as a foot hits him, followed by a shot into his side. 
Mechfluid 
> flows from the wound, his systems reporting massive damage.
> 
> He struggles to his back, with a yell jumping forward and swinging 
his sword 
> again at Shadow Wing.
